name: Maximum Gas!
description:
Maximum Gas! is an action-packed racing game designed for adrenaline junkies and speed enthusiasts who love the sound of roaring engines.

In this game, you'll take on the role of a daredevil driver, pushing your car to the limits as you race through dangerous courses filled with obstacles, jumps, and tight corners.

Your mission is to reach the end of each level, performing different acrobatic stunts with your car along the way. Whether you're jumping over ramps, drifting around corners, or performing other jaw-dropping feats, Maximum Gas! will keep your heart racing and your hands sweating as you push yourself and your vehicle to the brink.But while Maximum Gas! is all about pushing the limits of speed and performance, it also emphasizes the importance of safety. As you race through each level, you'll need to be careful not to crash or collide with obstacles, or you'll be forced to start over from the beginning.

So if you're ready to rev your engine and hit the open road, download Maximum Gas! today and get ready to experience the ride of your life!

Game features:
- 2 Game Modes ( Free and Career)
- 20 levels
- Possibility to upgrade your cars
- 5 cars
